New girl is just some random they knew from childhood who never wanted to play with them cus she'd rather read books and she walks with the kid to/from cram school. When they have sex guy asks if she's still taking care of him and also mentions him and new girl walking together and says she has to do something or the kid will be gone/taken from them but also says if he found out about hem fucking he'll become a shut in. New girl sees them flirting and knows how kid feels about his friend and feels bad and tries to egg him to confess so he finds out the bad news sooner than later but also that it isn't her place to say anything. During sex they talk shit about how he's still just a kid and she can't wait for his dick to grow up and when he sees the msg figures he's going to confess and how he has a thing for cuckold and tells her to hurry up and go see him. He confesses and she accepts and another monologue or w.e on how he will do his best to protect her like the last part.
